ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4

Class GL4TextureState

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4.GL4AbstractRenderState
      • ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4.GL4TextureState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, RenderState, TextureState

    public final class GL4TextureState
extends GL4AbstractRenderState
implements TextureState
    A concrete implementation of the texture-state interface for a GL4RenderSystem.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

        public void setTexture(Texture t)
        Description copied from interface: TextureState

        By default, it gets assigned to texture unit zero.

      • applyImpl

        protected void applyImpl(com.jogamp.opengl.GL4 gl)
        Description copied from class: GL4AbstractRenderState
        Abstract method to be implemented by a concrete render-state. It actually applies the render-state.

        This is an example of the Template Method design pattern.

        Specified by:
        applyImpl in class GL4AbstractRenderState
        Parameters:
        gl - The GL4 object, from the JOGL bindings.
